mapper.select: SELECT STU_NO , (SELECT COLL_NAME FROM COLLEGE WHERE COLL_NO = S.COLL_NO) AS COLL_NAME , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID= S.MAJOR_CODE) AS MAJOR_CODE , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = S.MINOR_CODE) AS MINOR_CODE , STU_YEAR , STU_SEM , STU_STATUS FROM STUDENT S , COLLEGE C , DEPT D WHERE S.COLL_NO = C.COLL_NO AND S.MAJOR_CODE = D.DEPT_ID AND STU_NO = #{stuNo}

SELECT M.MEM_NAME , C.COLL_NAME , S.STU_YEAR , D.DEPT_NAME , S.MINOR_CODE , TO_CHAR(M.MEM_BIRTH, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS MEM_BIRTH , S.STU_STATUS , S.STU_NO FROM STUDENT S , MEMBER M, COLLEGE C, DEPT D WHERE S.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO AND S.COLL_NO = C.COLL_NO AND S.MAJOR_CODE = D.DEPT_ID AND S.STU_NO = #{stuNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EDIT_STATUS ( EDIT_NO , STU_NO , NOW_STATUS , AFTER_STATUS ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(EDIT_NO) + 1, 1) FROM EDIT_STATUS) , #{stuNo} , '재학' , '휴학' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(EDIT_NO) FROM EDIT_STATUS WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND ING_STATUS = '승인대기'
